newsitem.title: USA: Digital '97 estimate cut - Morgan Stanley.
newsitem.headline: Digital '97 estimate cut - Morgan Stanley.

text.p: Morgan Stanley analyst Steve Milunovich said he fiscal 1997 earnings estimates on Digital Equipment Corp to $1.20 a share from $3.06 a share after its worse-than-expected Q1 loss and a sharp drop in revenues.
Milunovich said he maintains a neutral rating on the stock. Digital shares were off 3-1/8 to 31-1/4.

"The guidance near-term is fairly cautious," Milunovich said. "I question whether the slowdown in Alpha servers is totally due to the sales force reorganization." Milunovich said Digital may have lost some momentum in servers to its rivals in this competitive market.
